localised_text.last_approved_text: Cao Cao continues his campaign, pushing deep into our territory, and on the emperor's orders, so he says.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Cao Cao continues his campaign, pushing deep into our territory, and on the emperor's orders, so he says.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Our people flee from his oppression, but now his forces threaten them again - they must be defended!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Our people flee from his oppression, but now his forces threaten them again - they must be defended!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We have fled into the mountain pass, but are vulnerable if Cao Cao's forces are not held back.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We have fled into the mountain pass, but are vulnerable if Cao Cao's forces are not held back.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Zhang Fei, my brother… you are charged with a grave task, but the valley must be held - the people must escape.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Zhang Fei, my brother… you are charged with a grave task, but the valley must be held - the people must escape.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Fight well, my friend.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Fight well, my friend.

localised_text.last_approved_text: So Wang Lang thinks he can stall my conquest? We shall see!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So Wang Lang thinks he can stall my conquest? We shall see!

localised_text.last_approved_text: He has mustered a surprisingly large force against me, along the banks of the river. We must not overcommit this army.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: He has mustered a surprisingly large force against me, along the banks of the river. We must not overcommit this army.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I have reinforcements, led by my uncle, arriving soon - they can provide a flanking force to sweep the city and crush this army.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I have reinforcements, led by my uncle, arriving soon - they can provide a flanking force to sweep the city and crush this army.

localised_text.last_approved_text: We must endure, and not get trapped between two armies before Sun Jing arrives.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We must endure, and not get trapped between two armies before Sun Jing arrives.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hold fast, men - survive, and a glorious future awaits us all!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Hold fast, men - survive, and a glorious future awaits us all!

localised_text.last_approved_text: So it has come to this! We are cornered, and outnumbered, but never outmatched!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So it has come to this! We are cornered, and outnumbered, but never outmatched!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Lu Meng will attack from all angles, skulking in the woodlands. We must hold against this onslaught.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Lu Meng will attack from all angles, skulking in the woodlands. We must hold against this onslaught.

localised_text.last_approved_text: There is nothing else for it, friends - we must stand firm and repel this insidious advance.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: There is nothing else for it, friends - we must stand firm and repel this insidious advance.

localised_text.last_approved_text: If we fall here, so too will our flame be snuffed out forever. We must survive - for Lord Liu Bei, and for the Han!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: If we fall here, so too will our flame be snuffed out forever. We must survive - for Lord Liu Bei, and for the Han!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Zhuge Liang has predicted the wind would turn, and it has - the perfect time to strike is now! We must not waste this chance!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Zhuge Liang has predicted the wind would turn, and it has - the perfect time to strike is now! We must not waste this chance!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The ships approaching Cao Cao's navy are not surrendering, as he thought. Although he sees that, he cannot stop the events in motion now.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The ships approaching Cao Cao's navy are not surrendering, as he thought. Although he sees that, he cannot stop the events in motion now.

localised_text.last_approved_text: When the fire ships collide, we will begin our attack in the ensuing chaos.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: When the fire ships collide, we will begin our attack in the ensuing chaos.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Zhou Yu will land his forces on the beach and attack Cao Cao's camp directly, whilst my brothers and I will charge in on the flank.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Zhou Yu will land his forces on the beach and attack Cao Cao's camp directly, whilst my brothers and I will charge in on the flank.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Cao Cao must be stopped here, or his campaign of conquest will consume all of China. For the people, now, we will stop him!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Cao Cao must be stopped here, or his campaign of conquest will consume all of China. For the people, now, we will stop him!

localised_text.last_approved_text: My fleet may be ruined, and my armies scattered, but these traitors shall not have my head - not today!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: My fleet may be ruined, and my armies scattered, but these traitors shall not have my head - not today!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Zhuge Liang must be stopped here, at the Wuzhang Plains.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Zhuge Liang must be stopped here, at the Wuzhang Plains.

localised_text.last_approved_text: If he is allowed to advance into the mountains, the entire kingdom of Wei will be vulnerable.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: If he is allowed to advance into the mountains, the entire kingdom of Wei will be vulnerable.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yet now, his forces hold behind the city walls - he is no fool, he knew we were coming.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Yet now, his forces hold behind the city walls - he is no fool, he knew we were coming.

localised_text.last_approved_text: If we harass his scouting parties, the bulk of his army may be forced to investigate.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: If we harass his scouting parties, the bulk of his army may be forced to investigate.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I have reinforcements on the way, but we cannot allow an opportunity to pass by.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I have reinforcements on the way, but we cannot allow an opportunity to pass by.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Engage this force, draw them out, and hold them long enough for our reinforcements to arrive and wash them away.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Engage this force, draw them out, and hold them long enough for our reinforcements to arrive and wash them away.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The coalition does nothing, and so I must act.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The coalition does nothing, and so I must act.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The tyrant fields a larger army; stronger perhaps, but there are few options - he must be opposed!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The tyrant fields a larger army; stronger perhaps, but there are few options - he must be opposed!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I have sent for reinforcements, but am uncertain whether that aid will come. All the same, we must hold against the tyrant's onslaught.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I have sent for reinforcements, but am uncertain whether that aid will come. All the same, we must hold against the tyrant's onslaught.

localised_text.last_approved_text: If we persevere, and if reinforcements arrive, then we may have hope.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: If we persevere, and if reinforcements arrive, then we may have hope.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Do not let it be said that Cao Cao did not try to hold back the chaos.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Do not let it be said that Cao Cao did not try to hold back the chaos.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let it be said that I fought to restore order.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Let it be said that I fought to restore order.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A cornered tiger is dangerous, but must be bound all the same.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: A cornered tiger is dangerous, but must be bound all the same.

localised_text.last_approved_text: These troops stand in your defence. When I have swept them aside, they will serve me.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: These troops stand in your defence. When I have swept them aside, they will serve me.

localised_text.last_approved_text: You prepare your traps. But I see your design, Lü Bu.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: You prepare your traps. But I see your design, Lü Bu.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Already, your walls are weakened. Do not count on them!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Already, your walls are weakened. Do not count on them!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Even now, reinforcements ride to my aid, led by Xiahou Dun.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Even now, reinforcements ride to my aid, led by Xiahou Dun.
Fire!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your deceit has undone you, Lü Bu! You will be brought to justice!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Your deceit has undone you, Lü Bu! You will be brought to justice!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The end game approaches. Let the pieces move.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The end game approaches. Let the pieces move.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Men, forward!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Men, forward!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Xiahou Dun arrives with his cavalry! Your fate is now sealed, betrayer!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Xiahou Dun arrives with his cavalry! Your fate is now sealed, betrayer!

localised_text.last_approved_text: You are beaten, Lü Bu. Submit or this breath will be your last!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: You are beaten, Lü Bu. Submit or this breath will be your last!

localised_text.last_approved_text: “It is quiet here, brother… too quiet for my tastes. Something feels… wrong”

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: “It is quiet here, brother… too quiet for my tastes. Something feels… wrong”

localised_text.last_approved_text: “There – movement in the treeline!”

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: “There – movement in the treeline!”

localised_text.last_approved_text: “Prepare for battle brother, and may your blade strike true!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: “Prepare for battle brother, and may your blade strike true!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Sister! If we cross the river, we might be able to escape through the northern passage.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Sister! If we cross the river, we might be able to escape through the northern passage.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Or, we could attempt to survive the ambush through force of arms.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Or, we could attempt to survive the ambush through force of arms.

localised_text.last_approved_text: This hill would make a good defensive position en-route, should more forces arrive.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: This hill would make a good defensive position en-route, should more forces arrive.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The choice is yours sister - I know you will lead us to glory!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The choice is yours sister - I know you will lead us to glory!
